code: @Test public void testQuartzRoute() throws Exception {     MockEndpoint mock = getMockEndpoint("mock:result").     mock.expectedMessageCount(2).     mock.message(0).header("triggerGroup").isEqualTo("my_group").     mock.message(0).header("triggerName").isEqualTo("my_timer").     assertMockEndpointsSatisfied().     JobDetail detail = mock.getReceivedExchanges().get(0).getIn().getHeader("jobDetail", JobDetail.class).     assertNotNull(detail).     assertEquals("my_job", detail.getKey().getName()). }

@Override protected RouteBuilder createRouteBuilder() {     return new RouteBuilder() {          public void configure() {             from("quartz2://my_group/my_timer?trigger.repeatInterval=2&trigger.repeatCount=1&job.name=my_job").to("mock:result").         }     }. }
